title: Amazon KDP 7 Keywords - How to Boost Search Results

tactics.name: Keyword Phrase Optimization
tactics.description: Use specific, relevant keyword phrases in the 7 keyword boxes to improve indexing and ranking. Amazon indexes variations of keywords, so proximity and relevance matter.
steps: Find 1-3 highly relevant keyword phrases for your book
Use keyword research tools to spy on competitors
caveats: Avoid irrelevant keywords to prevent penalties
source_quotes: think of them as the perfect descriptive phrase your targeted reader would type into amazon when searching for your book
make sure that those keywords are not overly competitive

tactics.name: Keyword Research for Low Competition
tactics.description: Identify keywords with low competition to improve rankings without facing excessive competition.
steps: Use character-setting/time descriptors for fiction or pain-points/successes for non-fiction
caveats: Avoid overly competitive keywords that may break new authors
source_quotes: make sure that those keywords are not overly competitive

heuristics.name: Review-Driven Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting visibility through targeted keywords
source_quotes: don't waste that space for a random completely not related keywords with your book because you won't be ranked for anything that is not related to your book

heuristics.name: Boost Low-Review Keywords
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize boosting rankings
source_quotes: listen always pay attention how many search results come up

claims.statement: Amazon indexes variations of keywords in the 7 keyword boxes, not just exact phrases.
source_quotes: amazon actually does use all variations of the words that are in one box

claims.statement: Amazon KDP prioritizes keywords with less than 1,000 search results for better rankings

niche_patterns.description: Target specific niches by combining audience identity, their problems, and unique constraints to create highly searchable keywords.
niche_patterns.why_it_works: This structure aligns with Amazon's ranking algorithms by emphasizing relevance and specificity.
source_quotes: think of them as the perfect descriptive phrase your targeted reader would type into amazon when searching for your book
